MinimumBet.label: Minimum bet
MinimumBet.tooltip: Minimum bet to join a game

MaximumBet.label: Maximum bet
MaximumBet.tooltip: Maximum bet to join a game

MaximumPlayers.label: Maximum players
MaximumPlayers.tooltip: Maximum players that can participate in a game

TurnTimeout.label: Turn timeout
TurnTimeout.tooltip: The amount of time, in seconds, before a player is kicked for inactivity. 0 will remove the timeout
